meaningMnemonic: Out of <radical>bamboo</radical>, you make a <radical>brush</radical> – a <kanji>writing brush</kanji>. This is no ordinary brush, mind you. It is a brush specifically designed for writing elegant characters. And it’s made from bamboo!
readingMnemonic: Once the <kanji>writing brush</kanji> <reading>hits</reading> (ひつ) that paper, it’s like you transform into a totally different person. All of a sudden you’re a master calligrapher, writing anything and everything in a most beautiful fashion. Once that brush hits the paper, it’s on!
